about_the_game:
From the frozen archipelago of Sakhal, Frostline refugees with ice in their veins and fire in their hearts raid the Outlands. Equip yourself with the finest gear from DayZ's Frostline Pack and become a legend among their ranks!

This pack includes:


  • Hunter (Frostline) Uniform Set
  • Wolf Hat (Frostline)
  • Woolen Bag (Frostline)
  • Dr. Azimov (Frostline) Uniform Set
  • Snøstorm Ushanka (Frostline)
  • Frostguard Goggles (Frostline)
  • Ski Gloves (Frostline)
  • 3x VSS Vintorez + 60x ammo (9x39)
  • Frostline Skin for VSS Vintorez
  • 3x M4A1 + 180x ammo (5.56x45 NATO)
  • Frostline Skin for M4A1
  • 5x Sawed-Off Shotgun + 30x ammo (Shotgun Shell)
  • Frostline Skin for Sawed-Off Shotgun
  • 1000x Crowns

This pack may only be purchased once per account and is available for a limited time.
